website_summaries.verdict: This affordable option is comfortable and stamps little smiley faces into every snowball you make.
pros: 2.5" diameter snowballs come out with smiley faces molded into them
Set of 4 comes in pink, blue, yellow, and green
cons: Some snowball makers may not hold and form a ball as well as others

customer_reviews.title: plastic screw holding them together, need it to at least be metal
customer_reviews.text: these work fine for making snowballs, but the screw holding the two pieces of plastic together is plastic (rather than metal). I would make sure to get ones that have a metal screw so you dont have to worry as much about them breaking. assuming that you dont care, and that they dont break though, these work perfectly fine and are good at making snowballs
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Two Shoes

customer_reviews.title: What a fun product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It makes perfect snowballs. And is very simple. My 3, 6 and 8 year olds love them. They seem to be durable. My kids have played with them and thrown them around in the snow after a couple of snow storms and there have been no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jansen

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, I ordered 2 packages of 4 each, first I got just one and not only that I didn’t get what the description said. The snowball maker suppose to make 2 snowballs and what I got makes just one. So annoying. I have to send them back and re order but afraid that this happens again. :/
customer_reviews.author: Familia peluche

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Kids and adults loved making snowballs. These make the perfect snowball to throw.
customer_reviews.author: One happy family

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then i thought
customer_reviews.text: Got these for bath bombs . its big not sure if ill continue to use it but its build sturdy shipped fast no issues
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: These are great, just super noisey because my kiddos quickly turned them into clackers.
customer_reviews.author: Tif

customer_reviews.title: One of two worked great..
customer_reviews.text: One of them worked wonderfully, but the 2nd one didn't. The one that didn't work well couldn't hold the ball-form well. No matter how much or how little snow we used or how much we packed it, we couldn't form a fall and ended up with half-spheres that were tough to get out of the mold. But super happy with the one that did work!
customer_reviews.author: mrzrthlz

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I received these in bold colors and they have 2 snowball scoops on them. I didnt bother to return as I needed them for a party, but I wanted buyers to know that the picture is not what was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Levi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My kids Loved these! Made our snow trip very memorable
customer_reviews.text: My kids Loved these! Made our snow trip very memorable! Even my 3 year old was able to use with ease
customer_reviews.author: Prado Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well in the packing snow and the powder snow
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: With the right snow you can make perfect snowballs in no time. We had the right snow and made hundreds. Perfectly round and baseball sized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good value for the price. used all day and didn’t break
customer_reviews.author: Deena Heady

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the snow
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun. My kids can play in the snow for hours with them
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs these!
customer_reviews.text: Why make one snowball when you can make 2?! These have been a great addition to the lockdown of 2020. The kids (and adults) have had hours of fun with these. Surprisingly, none of them have broken even though we keep them outside all the time. They are exposed to cold, heat, snow, wind, and water.
customer_reviews.author: BambiWatson

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. ONLY MAKES 1 SNOWBALL AT A TIME
customer_reviews.text: I did not get what I ordered. I ordered the double snowball makers but got the single snowball makers. I can’t return them, because we used them on our ski trip (which is why I bought them). But if I were to order again, i would go with a different seller who doesn’t lie about the product they’re selling. There are cheaper 4 packs of what I got. They do work the same as any other single snow ball maker. Just not as described.
customer_reviews.author: amsterdammin

product_meta.title: ShellKingdom Sand Toys for Kids, Outdoor Play Beach Toys and Snowball Maker for Toddler Single Balls,2 Pack (one ball-4pcs)
feature_bullets: 1. Our Sand toys for kinds use thickening PE material-Freeze resistant, wear-resisting, lightweight, durable poly construction
2. Beach toys for toddlers size detalis- Dimensions:14*2.75 inch.
3. Our snowball maker not only for snow or ice - Can be used also with well mixed wet sand, mud and bath bombs
4. Our outdoor sand toys makes perfect round snow ball, sand ball in seconds with our simple, effective design can save your time, simply Scoop! Shape! & Throw!
5. It is great gift for your kids-Simply scoop up the snow/sand, press down the handle to compact the collected snow, and you are ready for a snowball/sand showdown.
